accessibility-camp.title: Accessibility Camp
accessibility-camp.description: Accessibility Camps are participant-driven events about web and software accessibility (A11y), with presentations, demos and interaction by and for A11yCamp participants.
accessibility-camp.comment: There was also Accessibility Camp Seattle but it is gone now.

t-dose.title: T-DOSE - Technical Dutch Open Source Event
t-dose.description: Annual eventin Eindhoven in The Netherlands. T-DOSE. T-DOSE is a free and yearly event held in The Netherlands to promote use and development of Open Source Software. During this event Open Source projects, developers and visitors can exchange ideas and knowledge.

ffconf.title: Full Frontal (ffconf)
ffconf.description: Annual Front End conference in Brighton, England.
